member.name: PROCESS_INFORMATION_CLASS
member.summary: Indicates a specific class of process information. Values from this enumeration are passed into the and functions to specify the type of process information passed in the void pointer argument of the function call.

member.name: PROCESS_INFORMATION_CLASS.ProcessMemoryPriority
member.summary: The process information is represented by a structure. Allows applications to lower the default memory priority of threads that perform background operations or access files and data that are not expected to be accessed again soon.

member.name: PROCESS_INFORMATION_CLASS.ProcessMemoryExhaustionInfo
member.summary: The process information is represented by a structure. Allows applications to configure a process to terminate if an allocation fails to commit memory.

member.name: PROCESS_INFORMATION_CLASS.ProcessAppMemoryInfo
member.summary: The process information is represented by a structure. Allows applications to query the commit usage and the additional commit available to this process. Does not allow the caller to actually get a commit limit.

member.name: PROCESS_INFORMATION_CLASS.ProcessInPrivateInfo
member.summary: If a process is set to ProcessInPrivate mode, and a trace session has set the flag, then the trace session will drop all events from that process.

member.name: PROCESS_INFORMATION_CLASS.ProcessPowerThrottling
member.summary: The process information is represented by a structure. Allows applications to configure how the system should throttle the target process’s activity when managing power.

member.name: PROCESS_INFORMATION_CLASS.ProcessProtectionLevelInfo
member.summary: The process information is represented by a structure.

member.name: PROCESS_INFORMATION_CLASS.ProcessLeapSecondInfo
member.summary: The process information is represented by a structure.

member.name: PROCESS_INFORMATION_CLASS.ProcessMachineTypeInfo
member.summary: The process is represented by a structure.

member.name: PROCESS_INFORMATION_CLASS.ProcessInformationClassMax
member.summary: The maximum value for this enumeration. This value may change in a future version.
